title: Binding price floor reduces total surplus

content.question: The equilibrium price for a good with a vertical supply curve and a downward-sloping demand curve is <math alttext="$20" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>20</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. If a binding price floor is set, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: There will be a shortage of the good.
The sum of consumer and producer surpluses will decrease.
The equilibrium price of the good will decrease.
The quantity sold of the good will remain unchanged.
Demand for substitutes for the good will decrease.

content.answer: The sum of consumer and producer surpluses will decrease.
